title: Random high ping and disconnects
body:
It is absolutely not my internet, it is League. During the lag/disconnect I can pull up anything else, browser, youtube, and all of it connects and loads instantly
The next game is no problem

replies.body:
I checked our records and it looks like everything is good from our end. While you can access other services or sites with no issues, note that each service you access online resides in a different geolocation, therefore you won't always have issues accessing all sites if you have troubles accessing one. Most of the time these issues are caused by routing issues specifically to our servers. Before we take a look at your route, I'd like you to work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so we can confirm your local network settings are configured properly for League.

Let me know if this caused any changes for you.
